page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
There are five farms in the area, two of which have extensive farm shops. These are {Batlers Green Farm}(155986) and {Church Farm}(139984). Most farms are mixed with arable and dairy cattle. Principal crops are: {Rape, Barley}(spring and autumn sown), {Wheat}(spring and autumn sown), { {Lucerne}and {Grass}for pasture, hay and sileage. {Dairy Cattle}are mostly{Fresians.
{Blackbirds Farm}(148998) has extensive market gardening activities with a 'pick your own' fruit and vegetable arrangement.
